name: Lisa
description: The languid but knowledgeable Librarian of the Knights of Favonius who was deemed by Sumeru Academia to be their most distinguished graduate in the past two centuries.

skills.name: Lightning Touch
skills.description:
Normal Attack: Performs up to 4 Electro attacks, dealing Electro DMG.

Charged Attack: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to deal Electro DMG after a short casting time.Plunging Attack: Gathering the might of Electro, Lisa plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals AoE Electro DMG upon impact with the ground.

skills.name: Violet Arc
skills.description:
Channels the power of lightning to sweep bothersome matters away

Press: Releases a homing lightning orb. On hit, it deals Electro DMG, and applies a stack of the Conductive status (Max 3 stacks) to opponents in a small AoE.Hold: After an extended casting time, calls down lightning from the heavens, dealing massive Electro DMG to all nearby opponents.Deals great amounts of extra damage to opponents based on the number of Conductive stacks applied to them and clears their Conductive status.Hold generate 5 elemental particles when it hit at least 1 target.

skills.name: Lightning Rose
skills.description:
Summons a Lightning Rose that unleashes powerful lightning bolts, launching surrounding opponents and dealing Electro DMG.

The Lightning Rose will continuously emit lightning to knock back opponents and deal Electro DMG for so long as it persists.

passives.name: Induced Aftershock
passives.description: Hits by Violet Arc's Conductive status to opponents.

passives.name: Static Electricity Field
passives.description: Opponents hit by Lightning Rose have their DEF decreased by 15% for 10s.

passives.name: General Pharmaceutics
passives.description: When Lisa crafts a potion, she has a 20% chance to refund one count of one material out of all the crafting materials used.

constellations.name: Infinite Circuit
constellations.description: Lisa recovers 2 Energy for every opponent hit while holding Violet Arc. A maximum of 10 Energy can be regenerated in this manner at any one time.

constellations.name: Electromagnetic Field
constellations.description:
Holding Violet Arc has the following effects:
Increases DEF by 25%.
Increases Lisa's resistance to interruption.

constellations.name: Resonant Thunder
constellations.description: Increases the level of Lightning Rose by 3. Maximum level upgrade is 15.

constellations.name: Plasma Eruption
constellations.description: Increases the number of lightning bolts released by Lightning Rose by 1-3.

constellations.name: Electrocute
constellations.description: Increases the level of Violet Arc by 3. Maximum level upgrade is 15.

constellations.name: Pulsating Witch
constellations.description: When Lisa takes the field, she applies 3 stacks of Violet Arc's Conductive status onto nearby opponents.This effect can only occur once every 5s.
